an4.262:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four qualities they’re not ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
an4.262:1.3: They have sensual, malicious, and cruel thoughts; or they’re witless, dull, and stupid.
an4.262:1.4: When a mendicant has these four qualities they’re not ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
an4.262:2.1: When a mendicant has four qualities they’re ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.
an4.262:2.3: They have thoughts of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness; and they’re wise, bright, and clever.
an4.262:2.4: When a mendicant has these four qualities they’re ready to frequent remote lodgings in the wilderness and the forest.”
